channel.title: Ricscape Client Help
channel.description:
I need help with my RicScape v7 Client This is the edit of my run.bat
[code]@ECHO OFF TITLE RicScape Client java -Xmx1000m client PAUSE[/code]
This is what happens when i run it
[code]Error occurred during initialization of VM Could not reserve enough space for object heap Could not create the Java virtual machine. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Edit: I have both J2SE 6U5 and JDK 6U5
